name: reportTelephone
description:
The [telephone report](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/206514816-Telephone-reports) allows you to view who dialed into meetings via phone (Audio Conferencing or SIP Connected Audio) and which number they dialed into and other details. Use this API to get telephone report for a specified period of time. **Scopes:** `report:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Heavy`
**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or higher plan.

type.description:
Audio types:
`1` - Toll-free Call-in & Call-out.
`2` - Toll
`3` - SIP Connected Audio

from.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

page_number.description:
**Deprecated** - This field has been deprecated and we will stop supporting it completely in a future release. Please use "next_page_token" for pagination instead of this field.

The page number of the current page in the returned records.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

$ul: **next_page_token**: The page number of the current results. (default: 1)
**page_count**: The number of pages returned for the request made.
**page_size**: The number of records returned with a single API call. (default: 30)
**total_records**: The total number of all the records available across pages.
